youCanAlwaysGoBack: You can always go back to remote storage.
name: Name
gitExplained: Read your tokens that are stored on your repository, close to your code.
filePathCaption: To sync to a single file add .json at the end, for folder-sync (Pro) just specify the folder path.

generic.title: Generic Versioned
generic.description: Access tokens stored on your own storage provider, allowing two-way sync, create and read-only operations.
generic.name: Name

url.title: URL
url.description: Tokens stored on a server allow you to add them as a read-only provider.

jsonbin.title: JSONBIN
jsonbin.description: Access tokens stored on JSONBin.io, a free JSON storage service for two-way sync.

supernova.description: Allows you to push tokens into specific brand and theme in a selected design system.

ado.description: Access tokens stored on your repository, push and pull tokens in a two-way sync.

selectALayerToSeeAppliedTokens: Select a layer to see applied tokens
confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this?
